title.full: Plants vs Zombies Garden Warfare Alpha Trial

description.full: The ultimate battle for brainz! Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare digs into the trenches with an explosive new Multiplayer action experience.  Blast zombies and plants across a mine-blowing world that delivers the depth of a traditional online shooter blended with the refreshing humor of Plant vs. Zombies.
description.short: The ultimate battle for brainz! Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare digs into the trenches with an explosive new Multiplayer action experience.
